page.lettertext:
fol.29r
[To my]
L. Trea
s
May it please yo
r
L. The 20 of this moneth I receaved 2 l
re
s
from yo
u
, w
th
2 enclosed to
M
r
Buzenval
, of w
ch
e one w
ch
I
tooke to bee
e second was dated in
London
e 2 of this p
nt
but
e
date of
e other was omitted in
e letter. M
r
Buzenval was at
Utrecht
when yo
r
l
re
s came unto mee, and his returne so uncertain
as I sent th
e
unto him by a messeng
r
of p
r
pose. They were
slowly brought to me by
e Dutch poste of London, & so was
e first
that I rxd from yo
r
L. for w
ch
I thought it not amisse to signifie
unto yo
u
, that I have alwaies found
e Englishe poste of
e
marchant
adventurers
of
Midelbourg
, to be
e surest &
e speediest. I will ever
be carefull to returne a p
nt
answere, wh
e
any l
re
of yo
r
L. is
deliv
r
ed unto me. We are newly now adv
r
tised
t
e entended
surprise of
e Towne of
Geertrudenbergh,
wh
r
of in my last I writ unto
yo
r
L. hath bin letted by some accident, in so muche as
e attempt
was not given by
Co. Maurice
. But yet
e siege doth go forward
&
e East side of
e Towne, w
ch
is called
e Lang straet is alredy
shutt in w
th
2 regiment
of foote, making 20 ensiegnes, & certaine
cornet
of horse, w
ch
are all commaunded by
Co. Hohenloo
: who is said
in like manner to have planted 10 peses of great artillery, w
th
intention this daie to beginne a batterie. Co. Maurice w
th
e rest of
his forces hath beset
e west side, but hath don so litell hithertoo,
as some hope is conceaved of a secret intelligence betwene him &
Magires
e gov
r
no
r
of Gertuden
b
who hath sent unto him divers
drumers since his forces were landed. It is also knowen
t
e
said Magires is highly discontented, for
t
by order of
e
king
his
gov
r
ment is granted to one Mons
r
Waterdicke, who hath bin gov
r
nour
there before, & was p
nt
ly now to enter: albeit w
th
in
e Towne hee
is very ill willed of all
e souldiers in garrison. This is all
t
I knowe of those actions as yet, but as occurrences shall come
there shall nothing worthe
e writing bee unsignified to yo
r
L.
&
so I take &c. Hage Ma
r
22 1592
